    "number": 160029,
    "data": "53,67,307,65587,18446744073709551667,340282366920938463463374607431768211507",
    "name": "Primes of the form 2^(2^n)+51.",
    "comment": [
        "Generated by n = 0, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7,...",
        "a(7) > 2^(2^23)+51. - _Martin M\u00f8ller Skarbiniks Pedersen_, May 31 2016"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "Select[Table[2^(2^n) + 51, {n, 0, 10}], PrimeQ] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 31 2016 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(PARI) g(n,m) = for(x=0,n,y=2^(2^x)+m;if(ispseudoprime(y),print1(y\",\")))",
        "(Magma) [a: n in [0..15] | IsPrime(a) where a is 2^(2^n)+51]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 31 2016"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A019434, A160027 - A160030."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
